messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the potential outcome for those who receive Cthulhu's call?
absolute madness and, sometimes, suicide
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What do some cultists believe about those who receive Cthulhu's call?
they may well speak the echoes of Great Cthulhu’s thoughts
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is unknown about Cthulhu's call to recipients?
whether there is intelligence behind such dream-sending or just the emanations of psychic residue
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the result of the recipient's mind being opened to the experience of Cthulhu?
the human’s mind is opened to awesome vistas of inhuman experience
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the intent of dreaming Cthulhu according to the text?
the unspeakable and implacable intent of dreaming Cthulhu
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens when a person first receives the dreams of Cthulhu?
They must make a Sanity roll (1/1D4 loss) and each night thereafter.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How long does the Keeper determine the dream-sending occurs usually?
1D20 days
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What effect does the dream-sending have on the character concerned?
It is left to the player and Keeper to best decide dependent upon that character’s temperament and artistic skills.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the effect of Cthulhu's dream-sending on mortal men?
It may have tipped some people into madness.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is Cthulhu's STR value?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How many investigators are scooped up by Cthulhu's claws in a round?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How many people can Cthulhu's facial tentacles grab per round?
Four
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the total damage bonus that Cthulhu can deal in a round?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How many hit points does Cthulhu have when fully solidified?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How long does it take for Cthulhu to regain full solidity?
1D10+10 minutes
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How many people can Cthulhu's facial tentacles grab per round?
Four people
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How many hit points does Cthulhu regain per round?
Six hit points
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How long does it take Cthulhu to regain full solidity?
1D10+10 minutes
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How many hit points does Cthulhu have when he is full and solid?
160 hit points
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to Cthulhu at 0 hit points?
He bursts and dissolves into a disgusting, cloying greenish cloud
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the Cthulhu Cult considered to be?
the largest and most wide-spread Mythos cult
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is believed to be the case with the methods and practices of different sects?
noticeably at odds with one another
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the relationship between the shared faith and the methods of the sects?
a common faith is shared, but the methods, practices, and dogma are at odds
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the nature of the work done by some members of the cult?
some work in silence and shadows
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who is believed to have serious theories about the Cthulhu Cult?
Professor Angell
